General.Name: Mare Nostrum
General.Description: Mare Nostrum SA provides human resources management services to worldwide. The company offers temporary work, recruitment, and training services, as well as wage portage and professional mobility services. Mare Nostrum SA was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Grenoble, France.
